stage1.title: Petualang Belantara Berkilauan
stage1.description: Selesaikan 10 Tantangan Time Trial dengan mengaktifkan mekanisme di Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, dan Vanarana.

stage2.title: Petualang Belantara Berkilauan
stage2.description: Selesaikan 20 Tantangan Time Trial dengan mengaktifkan mekanisme di Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, dan Vanarana.

stage3.title: Petualang Belantara Berkilauan
stage3.description: Selesaikan 40 Tantangan Time Trial dengan mengaktifkan mekanisme di Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, dan Vanarana.
